Build Zion in your home and hearts

Be an example in the community

Have your vision on the temple

Fulfillment of a prophecy in D&C 90

**11** For it shall come to pass in that day, that every man shall [hear](https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90?lang=eng&clang=eng&id=11,15#note11a) the fulness of the gospel in his own tongue, and in his own [language](https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90?lang=eng&clang=eng&id=11,15#note11b), through those who are [ordained](https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90?lang=eng&clang=eng&id=11,15#note11c) unto this [power](https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90?lang=eng&clang=eng&id=11,15#note11d), by the administration of the [Comforter](https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90?lang=eng&clang=eng&id=11,15#note11e), shed forth upon them for the [revelation](https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90?lang=eng&clang=eng&id=11,15#note11f) of Jesus Christ.

**15** And set in order the churches, and [study](https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90?lang=eng&clang=eng&id=11,15#note15a) and [learn](https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90?lang=eng&clang=eng&id=11,15#note15b), and become acquainted with all good books, and with [languages](https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90?lang=eng&clang=eng&id=11,15#note15c), tongues, and people.

And Acts Chapter 2

^**8**^ And how hear we every man in our own tongue, wherein we were born?

^**9**^ Parthians, and Medes, and Elamites, and the dwellers in Mesopotamia, and in Judaea, and Cappadocia, in Pontus, and Asia,

^**10**^ Phrygia, and Pamphylia, in Egypt, and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene, and strangers of Rome, Jews and proselytes,

^**11**^ Cretes and Arabians, we do hear them speak in our tongues the wonderful works of God.

^**12**^ And they were all amazed, and were in doubt, saying one to another, What meaneth this?
